app.name: Settings Editor GUI
app.long_description: Settings Editor GUI is a perfect add-on to postLoader, but it can be used on its own as well. With it, you can change the following: -Screen resolution -Aspect ratio -Sensor bar position -Sound mode -Wii remote rumble -Screen burn-in reduction -Shutdown mode -Wii remote sensitivity -WiiConnect24 -Internet Settings (boots directly into them)
